Chinese:
我跟你說，[p]！
我呀……我啊！！

English: I will NEVER forgive what those hackers did!
Chinese:
我覺得那些駭客，
實在是不可原諒！
Korean:
나, 그 해커들을
절대로 용서할 수 없어!
German: Ich werde diesen Hackern NIEMALS verzeihen!

English:
To use such adorable Digimon so selfishly, as 
their puppets--as their slaves!
Chinese:
數碼寶貝這麼天真可愛，他們居然讓數碼寶貝做牛做馬，
還把它們當成奴隸呼來喚去的！
Korean:
그렇게나 귀여운 디지몬을
자신의 손발처럼, 노예처럼, 제멋대로 부려 먹다니!
German:
Dass sie so niedliche Digimon so egoistisch als
Werkzeuge, ja, als Sklaven benutzen!

English:
And the Digimon were so miserable. I felt so, so
bad for them.
Chinese:
這樣子那些數碼寶貝實在太可憐了！
叫人怎麼忍心看得下去……
German:
Und den Digimon ging es total schlecht.
Ich hatte solches Mitleid mit ihnen.

English:
When I saw what you were doing, I knew I needed
to do something too.
Chinese:
老實說……看到你的行動後，
我也覺得我應該做些什麼……
Korean:
실은 나… 널 보고 있었더니
나도 뭔가 행동하지 않으면 안 된다고 생각했어…
German:
Als ich dir zugeschaut habe, wusste ich, dass ich
auch etwas tun muss.

English:
Looking on from the sidelines isn't good enough.
There must be something I can do to help!
Chinese:
我不應該只是在一邊袖手旁觀，
即使是我，應該也能幫得上忙！
Korean:
그저 보고만 있어서는 안 된다고
이런 나에게도, 무언가 할 수 있는 일이 있을 거라고!
German:
Nur zugucken reicht nicht.
Ich muss doch auch irgendwie helfen können!

English:
I just can't think of anything specific I can do
right now.
Chinese: 雖然現在，我還沒有具體的想法……
Korean: 지금은, 구체적으로 무엇을 할 수 있는지 생각 나지 않지만…
German:
Mir fällt nur gerade nichts Konkretes ein, was ich
jetzt tun könnte.

English:
But if I do, you'll be the first to know!
Look forward to it!
Chinese:
但如果我想到了，我一定會第一個跟[p]說的，
你等著吧！！
Korean:
무언가 떠오르면 가장 먼저 [p]에게 알려줄 테니까
기대하고 있어 줘!!
German:
Aber wenn, sage ich dir sofort Bescheid!
Das wird super!

English:
Okay, it's on! I'm going to use the power of my
sexy cute bod to the max!
Chinese:
好、我跟你拼了———！！
把我性感又可愛的身體裡潛藏的力量，毫無保留地發揮出來！
Korean:
좋았어, 해 주겠어―――!!
나의 에로귀염보디에 숨겨진 힘을 최대한으로 끌어내겠어!
German:
Okay, also los! Ich werde meinen unbestechlichen
Charme spielen lassen!
Nokia Shiramine ... Zeig, was du kannst!
